ingredients.name: Chicken breast
ingredients.description: Health benefits: Nuts are high in fiber, protein, healthy fats (omega-3), and minerals like magnesium and zinc. They help control weight, reduce the risk of cardiovascular disease and promote brain health.

Chicken breast is a lean cut of white meat that is low in fat and high in protein. 
 + It can be grilled, sautéed, or used in salads. This versatile ingredient can be seasoned with a variety of spices to enhance flavor.

products.Ingredients_along_with_proportions: 10 eggs, 170ml water, 500ml unsweetened fresh milk, 1 lemon, Sugar
products.Recipe: Put 120g sugar and 100ml water into the pot, put the pot on the stove and turn down the heat. Be careful not to stir sugar while cooking. When the sugar turns slightly yellow, squeeze in a little lemon. When the sugar has completely turned cockroach color, turn off the stove and slowly pour 70ml of water into the pot. Pour a thin layer of caramel into the mold and put the mold in the refrigerator for about 15 minutes.

products.Recipe: Sauté onions and garlic in a pot, add shrimp, broth, diced tomatoes, and seasonings, simmer until shrimp are cooked through, then serve hot garnished with herbs.

products.name: Granola recipe
products.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tem portul indunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
products.Ingredients_along_with_proportions: 3 cups rolled oats, 1 cup chopped nuts, 1 cup seeds, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, ½ teaspoon salt, ½ cup honey, ⅓ cup melted coconut oil, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup dried fruit.
products.Recipe: Combine 3 cups rolled oats, 1 cup chopped nuts, 1 cup seeds, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, and 1/2 teaspoon salt in a bowl, whisk together 1/2 cup honey, 1/3 cup melted coconut oil, and 1 teaspoon vanilla, mix with dry ingredients, spread on a lined baking sheet, bake at 350°F (175°C) for 20-25 minutes, stir halfway, cool, then mix in 1 cup dried fruit before storing in an airtight container.

products.name: Sweet potato soup
products.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tem portul indunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
products.Ingredients_along_with_proportions: Sweet potatoes: 3 medium (about 500g), peeled and cubed, Onion: 1 medium, chopped, Garlic: 2-3 cloves, minced, Carrot: 1 large, peeled and chopped, Vegetable broth: 4 cups (1 liter), Coconut milk (optional): 1 cup (240 ml) for a creamy texture Olive oil: 1-2 tablespoons, Ground cumin: 1 teaspoon, Ground cinnamon: ½ teaspoon, Ginger: 1 tablespoon fresh, grated (or ½ teaspoon ground ginger), Salt: To taste, Black pepper: To taste, Chili flakes (optional): A pinch for a bit of heat, Fresh herbs (optional): Chopped cilantro or parsley for garnish
products.Recipe: Sauté the onions and garlic: Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and garlic, and sauté until softened (about 4-5 minutes). Add carrots and sweet potatoes: Add the chopped sweet potatoes and carrots to the pot. Cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Spice it up: Add cumin, cinnamon, ginger, salt, and pepper to the pot, stirring to coat the vegetables in the spices. Add vegetable broth: Pour in the vegetable broth, ensuring the vegetables are covered. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer. Cover and cook for about 20-25 minutes, or until the sweet potatoes and carrots are soft. Blend the soup: Once the vegetables are tender, use an immersion blender to blend the soup until smooth. If using a regular blender, let the soup cool slightly before blending in batches. Add coconut milk (optional): For a creamier soup, stir in the coconut milk and heat the soup gently for another 5 minutes. Adjust seasoning: Taste the soup and adjust the seasoning with more salt, pepper, or chili flakes if needed. Garnish and serve: Serve hot with a garnish of fresh herbs like cilantro or parsley, and a drizzle of coconut milk if desired.
products.preparation_time: Preparation time (peeling, chopping, and gathering ingredients): 10-15 minutes Cooking time (sautéing, simmering, blending): 25-35 minutes You can expect the soup to be ready in about 40-50 minutes from start to finish!
products.estimated_quantity: If serving as a main course, it serves around 4 people. If serving as a starter or side, it can serve 5-6 people. You can adjust the ingredients proportionally if you need more or fewer servings.
products.number_of_calories: For 4 servings: Around 275-310 calories per serving. For 6 servings: Around 180-210 calories per serving.

products.name: Apple
products.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tem portul indunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
products.Ingredients_along_with_proportions: 2 small pumpkins Minced pork 200 gr 4 mushrooms 10 fresh shiitake mushrooms (fresh shiitake mushrooms) 2 green onions Fish sauce 2 teaspoons Regular seasoning 1 little (sugar/seasoning powder/pepper)
products.Recipe: Cut off the top of the pumpkin to make a lid, remove the intestines from the body of the pumpkin to leave space to stuff the pumpkin inside. Place the pot on the stove, add 1.5 liters of water and bring to a boil. Add the stuffed squash and steam for about 30 - 40 minutes until the squash is soft, then turn off the heat and open the lid to let the squash cool

products.name: Boiled eggs
products.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tem portul indunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
products.Ingredients_along_with_proportions: Eggs: 4 large eggs (adjust quantity based on need), Water: Enough to fully submerge the eggs in a pot (about 4-5 cups for 4 eggs) Salt (optional): 1 teaspoon (helps prevent cracking and makes peeling easier), Vinegar (optional): 1 tablespoon (also helps with peeling)
products.Recipe: Place eggs in a pot: Arrange the eggs in a single layer in the bottom of a pot. Add water: Pour enough water to cover the eggs by about 1 inch. Add salt and vinegar (optional): This can make peeling the eggs easier once boiled. Bring to a boil: Set the pot on medium-high heat and bring the water to a rolling boil. Boil time (depending on desired doneness): Soft-boiled: 5-7 minutes (yolk will be runny or slightly jammy) Medium-boiled: 8-10 minutes (yolk will be set but slightly creamy) Hard-boiled: 11-12 minutes (yolk fully cooked through) Cool eggs: Once done, transfer the eggs immediately to a bowl of ice water or run them under cold water for 5-10 minutes. This helps stop the cooking process and makes peeling easier.
products.preparation_time: Soft-boiled: ~12-15 minutes Medium-boiled: ~15-18 minutes Hard-boiled: ~18-20 minutes This includes the time for boiling, cooling, and peeling.
products.estimated_quantity: 1 egg: Suitable for a light snack or single use. 2 eggs: Standard serving for a single person (breakfast or snack). 4 eggs: Serves 2-3 people. 6-8 eggs: Ideal for making a larger batch, like for salads, meal prep, or feeding a group of 3-4 people.

products.name: Chicken soup
products.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tem portul indunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
products.Ingredients_along_with_proportions: Chicken (bone-in or boneless): 500g (about 2 chicken breasts or 4-6 thighs) Carrots: 2 medium, peeled and sliced, Celery: 2 stalks, chopped, Onion: 1 medium, diced, Garlic: 3 cloves, minced, Chicken broth: 6 cups (1.5 liters), Bay leaves: 2 leaves, Fresh thyme: 1-2 sprigs (or ½ teaspoon dried thyme), Olive oil: 1-2 tablespoons (for sautéing), Salt: To taste, Black pepper: To taste, Noodles or rice (optional): 1 cup (if using), Fresh parsley: 2 tablespoons, chopped (for garnish), Lemon juice (optional): 1 tablespoon for a bright flavor
products.Recipe: Cook the chicken: In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chicken and cook for 5-7 minutes, flipping occasionally, until lightly browned. Remove from the pot and set aside. Sauté vegetables: In the same pot, add the onion, garlic, carrots, and celery. Cook for about 5 minutes, until the vegetables start to soften. Add broth and seasonings: Pour in the chicken broth, add bay leaves, thyme, salt, and pepper. Return the chicken to the pot. Simmer: Bring the soup to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked. Shred chicken: Remove the chicken, shred it with two forks, and return it to the pot. Add optional noodles or rice: If you're adding noodles or rice, stir them in and cook for an additional 8-10 minutes (until cooked through). Finish: Adjust seasoning with salt, pepper, and lemon juice. Discard bay leaves and thyme sprigs. Garnish with fresh parsley.

products.name: Crab soup
products.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tem portul indunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
products.Ingredients_along_with_proportions: Crab meat: 300-400g (fresh or canned; lump or claw meat) Butter: 2 tablespoons Onion: 1 medium, finely chopped Garlic: 2 cloves, minced Carrots: 2 medium, diced Celery: 2 stalks, chopped, Potato (optional): 1 large, peeled and diced (for thickness), Seafood or chicken broth: 4 cups (1 liter), Milk or cream: 1 cup (240 ml) (for a creamy version), Bay leaves: 1-2 leaves, Old Bay seasoning: 1 teaspoon (optional, but great for flavor), Paprika: ½ teaspoon, Salt: To taste, Black pepper: To taste, Fresh parsley: 2 tablespoons, chopped (for garnish), Lemon juice: 1 tablespoon (for brightness)
products.Recipe: Sauté the vegetables: In a large pot, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the chopped onion, garlic, carrots, and celery. Sauté for about 5-7 minutes until softened. Add potatoes (optional): If using potatoes, add them to the pot and stir for 1-2 minutes. Add broth and seasonings: Pour in the seafood or chicken broth. Add the bay leaves, Old Bay seasoning (if using), paprika, salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for about 15-20 minutes until the potatoes are soft. Add crab meat: Gently stir in the crab meat. Simmer for another 5 minutes to heat the crab through. Add milk or cream: For a creamy crab soup, stir in the milk or cream and heat gently for another 5 minutes. Don’t bring to a boil, as this may curdle the milk. Finish: Taste and adjust the seasoning with more salt, pepper, or lemon juice. Discard the bay leaves. Serve: Garnish with fresh parsley and serve hot.

products.name: Egg avocado salad
products.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tem portul indunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
products.Ingredients_along_with_proportions: Eggs: 4 large, hard-boiled, Avocado: 2 medium, ripe, Lemon juice: 2 tablespoons (freshly squeezed), Red onion: ¼ cup, finely chopped (or green onion/scallions), Celery: 1 stalk, finely chopped, Dijon mustard: 1 tablespoon (optional, for added flavor), Salt: To taste, Black pepper: To taste, Fresh herbs (optional): 2 tablespoons of chopped fresh parsley, dill, or cilantro, Paprika (optional): A pinch for garnish
products.Recipe: Boil the eggs: Place the eggs in a pot, cover with water, and bring to a boil. Once boiling, reduce the heat and simmer for 9-12 minutes. After cooking, transfer the eggs to an ice bath to cool. Once cool, peel and chop them into bite-sized pieces. Prepare the avocado: Cut the avocados in half, remove the pits, and scoop the flesh into a mixing bowl. Mash the avocado with a fork, leaving some chunks for texture. Combine the ingredients: Add the chopped hard-boiled eggs, lemon juice, red onion, celery, and Dijon mustard (if using) to the bowl with the mashed avocado. Season the salad: Add salt, black pepper, and fresh herbs (if using) to the mixture. Gently mix until everything is well combined, being careful not to mash the eggs too much. Serve: Transfer the egg avocado salad to a serving dish or individual bowls. Garnish with a sprinkle of paprika (if desired) and serve immediately. Enjoy it on its own, in a sandwich, or on a bed of greens.

products.name: Minced meat porridge
products.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tem portul indunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
products.Ingredients_along_with_proportions: Minced meat (beef, pork, or chicken): 250g Rice: 1 cup (white or brown), Water or broth: 4 cups (1 liter), Onion: 1 medium, finely chopped, Garlic: 2 cloves, minced, Ginger: 1 tablespoon, minced (optional), Carrot: 1 medium, diced, Soy sauce: 2 tablespoons (adjust to taste), Salt: To taste, Black pepper: To taste, Green onions: 2 tablespoons, chopped (for garnish), Sesame oil: 1 teaspoon (optional, for flavor), Vegetable oil: 1 tablespoon (for sautéing)
products.Recipe: Prepare the rice: Rinse the rice under cold water until the water runs clear. Drain and set aside. Cook the minced meat: In a pot, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion, garlic, and ginger (if using). Sauté until the onions are translucent. Add minced meat: Stir in the minced meat, breaking it apart with a spoon. Cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes. Combine ingredients: Add the diced carrot and rinsed rice to the pot. Pour in the water or broth and add soy sauce, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine. Cook the porridge: Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low. Cover and let it simmer for about 20-30 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the rice is fully cooked and the porridge reaches your desired consistency. Add more water if it becomes too thick. Finish and serve: Once cooked, adjust the seasoning with more soy sauce, salt, or pepper if needed. Drizzle with sesame oil (if using) and stir. Serve hot, garnished with chopped green onions.

products.name: Black bread with egg butter
products.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tem portul indunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
products.Ingredients_along_with_proportions: Black bread (rye or whole grain): 4 slices, Eggs: 4 large, hard-boiled, Butter: 4 tablespoons (softened, plus extra for spreading), Mayonnaise: 2 tablespoons (optional, for creaminess), Dijon mustard: 1 teaspoon (optional, for flavor), Salt: To taste, Black pepper: To taste, Fresh herbs (optional): 2 tablespoons, chopped (such as dill or chives), Paprika (optional): A pinch for garnish
products.Recipe: Boil the eggs: Place the eggs in a pot, cover with water, and bring to a boil. Once boiling, reduce the heat and simmer for 9-12 minutes. After cooking, transfer the eggs to an ice bath to cool. Once cool, peel and chop them. Make the egg butter: In a mixing bowl, combine the chopped hard-boiled eggs, softened butter, mayonnaise (if using), Dijon mustard (if using), salt, and black pepper. Mix until well combined and creamy. You can adjust the consistency by adding more butter or mayonnaise as desired. Prepare the black bread: Toast the slices of black bread if desired. Spread a thin layer of extra butter on each slice. Assemble: Generously spread the egg butter mixture on each slice of black bread. Garnish and serve: If desired, garnish with fresh herbs and a sprinkle of paprika. Serve immediately.

products.name: Steamed tofu with eggs
products.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tem portul indunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
products.image: ../assets/images/Easy on stomach snacks/Steamed tofu with eggs.jpg
products.Ingredients_along_with_proportions: Drained and roughly chopped tofu, 1/2 cup vegetable oil, 1/2 cup extra-virgin olive oil, 2 medium carrots
products.Recipe: Mix all ingredients in a large bowl

products.name: Apple cinnamon
products.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tem portul indunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
products.Ingredients_along_with_proportions: Apples: 4 medium (such as Granny Smith, Honeycrisp, or Fuji), peeled, cored, and sliced, Cinnamon: 1-2 teaspoons (adjust to taste), Sugar: 2-4 tablespoons (brown sugar or granulated, to taste), Butter: 2 tablespoons (for sautéing), Lemon juice: 1 tablespoon (freshly squeezed, to prevent browning), Nutmeg (optional): ¼ teaspoon (for added flavor), Vanilla extract (optional): 1 teaspoon (for added flavor), Oats (optional): ½ cup (for a crumbly topping)
products.Recipe: Prepare the apples: Peel, core, and slice the apples into thin wedges. Sauté the apples: In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the sliced apples and lemon juice. Cook for about 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the apples start to soften. Add sugar and spices: Sprinkle the sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg (if using), and vanilla extract (if using) over the apples. Stir well to combine. Continue to cook for an additional 5-10 minutes until the apples are tender and caramelized. Optional topping: If using oats, you can mix the oats with a bit of butter and cinnamon and sprinkle them on top of the apples. Cook for a few more minutes until the topping is golden brown. Serve: Serve warm as a dessert on its own, over pancakes, or with yogurt or ice cream.

products.name: Avocado and spinach
products.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tem portul indunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
products.Ingredients_along_with_proportions: Fresh spinach: 4 cups (washed and dried), Avocado: 1 large or 2 small, diced, Cherry tomatoes: 1 cup, halved (optional), Cucumber: 1 medium, sliced or diced, Red onion: ¼ cup, thinly sliced (optional), Feta cheese: ½ cup, crumbled (optional), Olive oil: 3 tablespoons (for dressing), Lemon juice: 2 tablespoons (freshly squeezed), Honey or maple syrup: 1 teaspoon (optional, for sweetness), Salt: To taste, Black pepper: To taste
products.Recipe: Prepare the salad ingredients: In a large bowl, combine the fresh spinach, diced avocado, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion (if using), and feta cheese (if using). Make the dressing: In a small bowl or jar, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, honey (if using), salt, and black pepper. Toss the salad: Drizzle the dressing over the salad and gently toss to combine, being careful not to mash the avocado. Add crunch: If desired, sprinkle pumpkin seeds or nuts on top for added texture and flavor. Serve: Enjoy the salad immediately as a light meal or side dish.

products.Ingredients_along_with_proportions: Avocado: 2 large, ripe, Tomatoes: 1 cup, diced (such as cherry or Roma), Red onion: ¼ cup, finely chopped, Cucumber: 1 medium, diced, Fresh lime juice: 2 tablespoons (or lemon juice), Olive oil: 1 tablespoon, Salt: To taste, Black pepper: To taste, Fresh cilantro or parsley: 2 tablespoons, chopped (optional), Jalapeño (optional): 1 small, finely chopped (for heat)
products.Recipe: Prepare the ingredients: Cut the avocados in half, remove the pits, and scoop the flesh into a bowl. Dice the avocado into bite-sized pieces. Combine the ingredients: Add the diced tomatoes, red onion, cucumber, lime juice, and olive oil to the bowl with the avocado. If using, add jalapeño and fresh herbs. Season: Gently toss the salad and season with salt and black pepper to taste. Serve: Enjoy immediately as a refreshing salad or as a topping for tacos, sandwiches, or grilled meats.

products.Ingredients_along_with_proportions: Bananas: 2 large, ripe, Milk: 1 cup (or any non-dairy milk like almond, soy, or oat milk), Yogurt: ½ cup (plain or vanilla, can be non-dairy if preferred), Honey or maple syrup: 1-2 tablespoons (adjust based on sweetness preference), Ice cubes: ½ cup (optional, for a chilled smoothie), Peanut butter or almond butter: 2 tablespoons (optional, for creaminess and flavor), Chia seeds or flaxseeds: 1 tablespoon (optional, for added nutrition), Cinnamon: ½ teaspoon (optional, for flavor)
products.Recipe: Prepare the ingredients: Peel the bananas and break them into chunks. Blend: In a blender, combine the banana chunks, milk, yogurt, honey (if using), and any optional ingredients (ice, nut butter, seeds, cinnamon). Blend until smooth: Blend until the mixture is smooth and creamy. You can adjust the thickness by adding more milk if needed. Serve: Pour into glasses and enjoy immediately!

products.Ingredients_along_with_proportions: Lettuce (romaine, iceberg, or mixed greens): 4 cups, chopped, Tomatoes: 1 cup, diced (cherry or regular), Cucumber: 1 medium, sliced or diced, Carrots: 1 medium, grated or julienned, Bell pepper: 1 medium (any color), diced, Red onion: ¼ cup, thinly sliced, Radishes (optional): ½ cup, sliced, Avocado (optional): 1 large, diced, Olive oil: 3 tablespoons (for dressing), Vinegar: 1 tablespoon (balsamic, red wine, or apple cider vinegar), Salt: To taste, Black pepper: To taste, Fresh herbs (optional): 2 tablespoons, chopped (such as parsley, basil, or cilantro)
products.Recipe: Prepare the vegetables: Wash and chop all the salad ingredients as specified. Combine the salad: In a large bowl, combine the chopped lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, carrots, bell pepper, red onion, radishes (if using), and avocado (if using). Make the dressing: In a small bowl or jar, whisk together the olive oil, vinegar, salt, and black pepper. Adjust the seasoning to taste. Toss the salad: Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine, ensuring all ingredients are coated. Serve: Garnish with fresh herbs (if using) and serve immediately as a side dish or light meal.

products.name: Pumpkin
products.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tem portul indunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
products.Ingredients_along_with_proportions: Pumpkin: 4 cups, peeled, seeded, and cubed (about 1 medium pumpkin or 2 cans of pumpkin puree), Onion: 1 medium, chopped, Garlic: 2 cloves, minced, Carrot: 1 medium, chopped, Vegetable or chicken broth: 4 cups, Coconut milk: 1 cup (or heavy cream for a richer flavor), Olive oil or butter: 2 tablespoons (for sautéing), Ginger: 1 teaspoon, grated (optional, for added warmth), Cinnamon: ½ teaspoon (optional, for flavor), Nutmeg: ¼ teaspoon (optional, for flavor), Salt: To taste, Black pepper: To taste, Fresh herbs (optional): Chopped parsley or cilantro for garnish
products.Recipe: Prepare the ingredients: If using a fresh pumpkin, peel, seed, and cube it. Chop the onion, carrot, and garlic. Sauté the vegetables: In a large pot, heat the olive oil or butter over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and carrot, and sauté until softened, about 5-7 minutes. Add the minced garlic and ginger (if using) and cook for another minute until fragrant. Add the pumpkin and broth: Stir in the cubed pumpkin and broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the pumpkin is tender. Blend the soup: Use an immersion blender to purée the soup until smooth. Alternatively, transfer the soup to a blender in batches and blend until smooth. Add coconut milk and season: Return the blended soup to the pot. Stir in the coconut milk (or heavy cream) and add cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, and pepper to taste. Heat the soup over low heat until warmed through. Serve: Ladle the soup into bowls and garnish with fresh herbs if desired.

products.Ingredients_along_with_proportions: Fresh strawberries: 2 cups, hulled and sliced, Mixed greens (such as spinach or arugula): 4 cups, Feta cheese: ½ cup, crumbled (or goat cheese), Almonds or walnuts: ¼ cup, sliced or chopped (optional, for crunch), Red onion: ¼ cup, thinly sliced (optional), Balsamic vinegar: 3 tablespoons (for dressing), Olive oil: 2 tablespoons (for dressing), Honey or maple syrup: 1 teaspoon (optional, for sweetness), Salt: To taste, Black pepper: To taste
products.Recipe: Prepare the strawberries: Hull and slice the strawberries, then set aside. Combine the salad ingredients: In a large bowl, combine the mixed greens, sliced strawberries, feta cheese, almonds or walnuts (if using), and red onion (if using). Make the dressing: In a small bowl or jar, whisk together the balsamic vinegar, olive oil, honey (if using), salt, and black pepper. Toss the salad: Drizzle the dressing over the salad and gently toss to combine, ensuring all ingredients are coated. Serve: Enjoy immediately as a refreshing side dish or light meal.
